page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN MOORSHOLM
page.content: Total population 399 Between 16 and retirement age 223 Males 121 + Females 102 = 223 Housewives only 54 Regular part time employment 24 Early retirement taken 6 Medically incapacitated 4 Unemployed 7 {SELF EMPLOYED}(40){EMPLOYEES}(88) Agriculture 13 Education 19 Shop owners 7 Building trades 5 I.C.I. 8 Food and drink 5 Agriculture 7 Transport 4 B.S.C 5 Animal husbandry 2 Shops 5 Law 2 Offices 5 Broadcasting 1 Nursing 4 Computer Bus drivers etc4 programming 1 Marketing 3 Building trade 3 Boulby Potash 2 Others 13
